resources.string: "Shake And Roll Dice" sound was made by Mike Koenig (soundbible.com) and used via CC BY 3.0 license
Icons made by Delapouite and Lorc.\nAvailable on https://game-icons.net
This application was created by František Maša and his student peers, now it\'s developed\nin free time by František Maša.\nIf you like the app, please consider rating WFRP Master on Google Play.
At least one location is required
Armour is auto-calculated from worn armour trappings.
There is already different WFRP Master account associated with given Google account.\nDo you want to sign in to that account instead?
You will lose access to these parties:
You are not signed-in.\nSigning-in lets you keep access to parties between devices.
Email with instructions for password reset was sent
Too many attempts.\nTry again in a few minutes or reset your password.
There are no blessings in your compendium yet.
Career level with same name already exists
There are no careers in your compendium yet.
Create at least one level\nto let Characters use this career.
Character will become available for a different Player
At least one character tab must be visible
Character does not have any Weapon trappings equipped
Do you really want to permanently remove %s?
Do you really want to turn this Character to an NPC?
Do you really want to turn this Character to a Player Character?
There are already unassigned Characters created by GM, you can assign one of them to yourself.
Do you really want to turn unlink this Character from a Player?\nThe Player will lose access to this Character.
Does not apply to Group Advantage
Do you really want to dismiss this tip?
Allowed operators: +,-,/,*,(,), MIN(…), MAX(…) and variables: %s
The file is not saved anywhere and never leaves your device.
Import compendium previously exported from WFRP Master.
The export format is not set in stone yet\!
So while exports from the same version of WFRP Master will work, exports from previous versions may not work properly.
JSON import failed. Check that you provided valid WFRP Master export.
There are no changed items to import
Your GM has to add them first.
PDF import failed. Not enough available RAM on device.
PDF import failed. Check that you provided valid rulebook PDF.

Select which spells you want to import.
Select which talents you want to import.
Select which traits you want to import.
Select which trappings you want to import.
Only the latest version of English Rulebooks are supported.
Import compendium from official WFRP Rulebook PDFs.
Add first encounter for your party.
Do you really want to remove this encounter?
You can create sub-folders by using %s as separator
There are no entries in your journal yet.
This feature is currently not available for Desktop version. We plan to introduce it in future versions.
There are no miracles in your compendium yet.
There are no NPCs yet. Add first one.
Do you really want to permanently remove this NPC?

There are several Talents and Traits that affect various Character stats and mechanics, such as *Hardy*. This option changes the language used to match these Talents and Traits, so e.g. when using the Italian language, *Gagliardo* is interpreted as *Hardy*, and the effect is correctly applied.\n\n For list of supported Talents and Traits see [WIKI](https://github.com/fmasa/wfrp-master/wiki/Automation#effects).
Changing the Party Language may affect existing Characters
You are already member of this party
Compendium card has been moved to the World tab.
Alternatively you can ask your GM for invitation link.
Players can open this URL on their devices to gain access
Do you really want to leave this party?
No player has joined this party yet.
Create your first party\nor join the existing one.
Players can scan this QR code in their apps
Scan the code provided by your GM
Do you really want to remove this party?
You need to be connected to internet to create parties
You need to be connected to internet to update party
Access to camera is needed to let you scan QR codes with party invitations.
Please, grant us access on the Settings screen.
All Basic Skills (%d) will be added without any Advances.
There are no additional Basic Skills to add from Compendium.
There are no skills in your compendium yet.
There are no spells in your compendium yet.
There are no talents in your compendium yet.
Hardy checkbox will be removed in the future.\nAdd Talent called "Hardy" and delete manual Max. Wounds value instead.
Character cannot test against advanced skill (s)he does not know.
There are no traits in your compendium yet.
Total encumbrance of character (current encumbrance / total encumbrance)
Trappings cannot be stored in Container that is itself stored in a Container.

Price for a pack of %d pieces
Must be greater or equal to 0
Must be positive number without decimals
